name: tm23
effect: Teaches Iron Tail to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Smack Down to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III & II: Iron Tail Gen I: Dragon Rage)

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user throws a stone or similar projectile to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when it’s hit.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user throws a stone or similar projectile to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when it’s hit.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The target is punched with an electrified fist. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
